author: MA Milián
comment: Nice concept, but design points are off.  The watch face uses two different shades of yellow/gold that look terrible together and there is no option for 24 hour time or much customization for a paid app.  Don't buy this face until it is optimized.  Also, as a side note, the English directions and prompts in the settings are hilariously erroneous.  On a Huawei 2 and TH Connected watches, I haven't observed any crashes or instabilities like others have noticed.

author: Andrew Singleton
comment: Nice design and good concept let down by poor stability. Every so often it will mess up and the watch will revert to the Basic watch face. The weather seems to be the main culprit, but now I can't turn it off. I've been through uninstalling and reinstalling, clearing cache, resyncing etc several times with no pattern to what will get it working again (temporarily).

author: Edson Castaneda
comment: Very disappointed, give all permissions and watch face crashes always. Not recommend to anybody. Don't buy it is a waste of your money

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
The watch face always crashed?
Strangely, we do not see any problems for ver.2.1.7 in Google Console. 
Send us a screenshot and a letter to support@mobimarketlab.com. Thank you.

author: Hernan Jr
comment: No solid black background and no full and bient mode. Missing hour markers... Such a disappointment‼️ The free version was so beautiful now junk. Even missing full ambient mode, no hour markers. Such a loss this was the most beautiful

author: Michael Soto
comment: Battery Hog. I'm an HTC 10 user. Design and functionality appears to be a good build but just can't get past the battery drain to test.  I would not recommend this watch if you are concerned with battery life.

author: Grant Boydell
comment: All great except second time zone. Main face on local time (with daylight saving) and second time zone is 1 hour short. No good for travel.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
What exactly do you not like about "Time2"? Please write to our technical support address: support@mobimarketlabs.com
Thanks.

author: Alan Fox
comment: Weather feature very poor - always in Albatross, CA.  Can't remove the 5 above the word SMS. Not as costomizable as advertised. Feel I wasted my money. 🙁

author: عبدالله عتيق
comment: My problem is with the weather I have to go to the launcher app to refresh it.  I tried many time but couldent

author: SANDIPAN MAZUMDER
comment: Battery hungry watch face... do something to minimize battery usage.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Please, use Ambient mode configuration. Thanks.

comment: Used to like this until huwai watch one updated to wear 2. Now can't select it. The free version works fine

author: Reece Williams
comment: Excellent custom options. Would like night mode on all day if possible.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: It is interesting, we will think over such function. Thanks for your feedback!

author: Nathanael Collins
comment: Sent an email last week, have yet to hear back.  Watch face keeps flipping from degrees F to degrees C.  Has potential but due to poor customer service and glitches i give it 2.5 stars of mediocrity.
POS - I can't get paid version to work even after reading help and turning on permissions. Sent an email to developers - will update this if they get back to me. For now, I've been ripped off.

author: Ted Van Atta
comment: Love the concept...Doesn't work. weather is off as well...Says snow in my area and it's Sunny?

author: Chris Syrakis
comment: Love ❤ the look of it

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks ;) !!!

author: Ron Mason
comment: Was working until last update. Now gets "Unfortunately, BW Inter has stopped" Tried uninstalling watch and App and re-installing but same result. Please fix. (S7 Edge 7.0)

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
1. Check smart watches firmware updates.
2. Uninstall watch face with "CLEAR DATA" & "CLEAR CACHE".
3. Reinstall  watch face.
If you need help, please, write to: support@mobimarketlabs.com
Thanks.

author: NISHIT SAPRA
comment: This face is nice but 2 downsides. Even though I purchased it the sms and calls counter  do not display on the face, secondly the ambient face hands are just an outline hence not clearly visible. Rest is good, but would be worth the money if the other 2 work

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Check permissions for Configuration app.
 Please, check the new version. Thank you.

author: Gabriel M
comment: The small round watch it seems to be useless, just to fill out the space. Just like permanent wireless icon that should have an on/off button. Instead can you please implement weather? Thanks!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Weather + on/off buttons (for WiFi&Vibro) - in next versions. Thanks for your rate!

title: Nice but...

author: Kawo Lee
comment: After installing the latest Google wear, I can see this watch face anymore. Tried so many times of installation and uninstallation, in vain. Please Fix it! So frustrated!

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
We will solve this issue next couple of weeks.
Thank you for your patience.
For more help, please, write on our e-mail address: support@mobimarketlabs.com

author: edeysim
comment: Used on a Sony Smartwatch 3 and this fills the corners well. It would be great if phone battery strength could be displayed as well. Thanks.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks!

title: Fills up a Square watch face

author: Duane Gray
comment: Only reason I paid for premium version was to get msg count and calls and neither shows up.  Also change city name and it still says b/w.   Uninstalled and reinstalled 3 times,  rebooted phone and watch.  LG Urbane (non LTE) with Samsung Note 5.  I bought  symmetric version and it doesn't show either.   I have set the permissions under applications,  no change… still sucks. Wasted my money,  free version gave me the feature that work.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
1. City name - this is custom city name for Time2 widget.
2. Watch face name not changed!
Thanks.

title: Doesn't show text or calls

author: Inthikhab Raban
comment: I have purchased three watch faces and all three has a bug need to be fixed. The SMS count does not reset after reading the message. It keep on adding the number every time I get a message. Now at this time it shows 45 SMS but there are no new messages all my message marked read. Please please fix. Other than that I love the watch faces. I have BW Inter, Pixel and Y360 Inter watch faces on my Moto 360 2nd generation.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Check permissions for Configuration app (for Read SMS). 
Please, check the new version. Thank you.

author: John D
comment: Keeps resetting to the default on the LG G WATCH. Waste of money.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback!

title: What a poor watch face

author: Babak Seghatoleslam
comment: It has a problem with notifications in ambient mode which has a grey back ground

author: kev vincent
comment: Mmlplayservice keeps asking for permissions everyone even though they are set on phone uninstalling  I am not using a custom rom. i am using Android 6.0

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
If you removed our app, just reboot smartphone. 
We would appreciate if you will not hurry to put the rating.
If need help, email us for more information on support@mobimarketlabs.com 
Thanks.

author: David Thomas
comment: Good app but drains watch battery Way to quick.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Discharged battery over what period of time? Model your smart watch? Thank you.

title: Drains battery

author: George Nugent
comment: Liked the free one so I purchased this one. Great job.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Now we prepare update: Weather + phases of the Moon.
Thanks for your rate!

author: valeriu hirsch
comment: Ok

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks.

author: Gerrit Van Wyngaard
comment: Watch: G Watch R.  Cannot get stopwatch to work. Please arrange applications list alphabetically. Have option to show only Wear apps.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
1.Stopwatch - describe in detail (you can not open a menu of the watch face or ...?). 2.The list of applications to start output from the smartphone. It makes no sense to display a list of applications installed on the smart watch if it is available in system menu. 3.Sort the names of applications - fix in the near future.
Thanks for your feedback.

title: Too many bugs

author: Stanislav Kateliev
comment: Can you please add options for watch rings and stock battery icon

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
No problem. Please, write to us in detail, your wishes to our address: support@mobimarketlabs.com
Thanks for your feedback and rate!

title: BW

author: Jose Medina
comment: The irony is that, the free version allows a smooth second hand, this one doesn't. I bought it with hopes in getting more features, they're great once permissions are enabled within the watch. However, it needs to be customized further, the minutes hands in ambient need to be as same as the preset selected, and further features such as longer timeout on full face to ambient mode could be welcome. Just a bit more work, straight forward info and this can be a gem to be had. Keep up the good work. Honest.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks for your very informative feedback. Please note your wishes in the development of the next version.

title: Cool watchface, but needs some work, smooth second hand option missing.

author: Christopher Lee
comment: -2* for not able to remove the step counter, I'm stuck with the steps (the main reason I bought the paid version)! -½* for the thicker ring design on the sub-dials, they make the face look less elegant and more cartoonlike. -½* for overall lack of options. I reverted to the free version since I could not remove the steps...

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Please, try update the watchface to version 2.0. (Remove older version with clear data and cache). Important to us your assessment. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Steps stuck! Design less elegant!

author: KenR
comment: App keeps crashing and won't offer refund. Disappointed as I like the look of the watch. Also customisation options are very limited for a "paid" app.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Please, try update to new version 2.0.
Note: remove older version with clear data and cache.
Thanks.

title: Poor to say the least...

author: Nicolas Castillo
comment: Keeps crashing unable to personalize it.  Tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it with the same results.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Please, try update to new version 2.0.
Note: remove older version with clear data and cache.
Thanks.

title: Crashes

author: Jim Duke
comment: I can't remove the steps counter even though I uncheck the Box

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: At the moment, opt step counter can only ambient mode. We'll keep it in the next version. Try update the watchface to version 2.0. (Remove older version with clear data and cache). Important to us your assessment. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Moto 360

author: Rusty Sharp
comment: Love the look and the ability to customize. Thanks for a great interactive watchface. Keep up the great work.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Please, try update to new version 2.0. Thanks.

title: Great watchface

author: Glenn Koetzner
comment: I uninstalled after getting a message that this watchface did not work properly because there were no default permissions. Has this been corrected? I'd really like to try again. Thanks

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
To work correctly, you must set permissions for watch face on your smartphone.
This operating principle Android OS on your smartphone.
If need it, email us for more information on support@mobimarketlabs.com
